  3. Include all original packing materials and accessories.

giftCardEmailIntro: Thank you for purchasing a {0} Gift Card. Do not delete this message -- to redeem the gift card you must use the gift card claim code below. You may want to print a copy of this message for easy reference later.
giftCardEmailInstructions:
Follow these steps to redeem the gift card:
  • Visit {0}
  • Enter the Claim Code when prompted during checkout.
  • Gift card funds will then be applied automatically to orders.
    NOTE: if you have an account, the remaining funds will be added to your account. If you do not have an account, you will need to use the claim code again to use the remaining funds on any future purchases.
  • You must pay for any remaining balance on your order with another payment method.
giftCardEmailClosing:
If you have questions about redeeming your gift card, please visit {0}

Sincerely,

Customer Service

cookieText: NEOSTRATAÂ® of Canada uses cookies and other technologies on our site so that we, and our media agencies can understand how you use our site and provide you with ads tailored to your interests across the Internet. You may also visit the AdChoices consumer opt-out page to learn more about interest based advertising and manage your preferences for interest based advertising by any of the participating companies listed on the tool.
newsletterSubtitle: Don't miss out on the latest product launches, sales and insider deals!
newsletterConfirmation: The NEOSTRATAÂ® INSIDER program, brought to you by NEOSTRATAÂ® of Canada, will be reaching out to you with trial offers, contests, high-value coupons and helpful health and wellness and happiness tips and information. Do you consent to receive these communications, including by electronic means (e.g. email and/or text) from the NEOSTRATAÂ® INSIDER program? Privacy Policy
newsletterDisclaimer: Your personal information will be stored in the databases of NEOSTRATAÂ® of Canada and its third party service providers inside and outside Canada. The personnel, agents and third party service providers of NEOSTRATAÂ® of Canada. may have access to your personal information to manage data in compliance with our Privacy Policy or to provide you with promotional materials or services you have requested or to which you have consented. For more information on the privacy practices of NEOSTRATAÂ® of Canada, including data collection, use, purposes, disclosure and our use of service providers inside and outside of Canada, or to request a written copy of our Privacy Policy, access to your file or the correction of information, or to unsubscribe or withdraw your consent for any communications from us, please use our contact us form or send your request by mail to Consumer Care Center, Attn: Canadian Chief Privacy Officer, 199 Grandview Rd., Skillman, NJ, USA 08558-9418.

matchContent2: Meet the new & scientifically reformulated NEOSTRATA®
matchContent3: Now there are even more reasons to love the products you love.
matchContent4: Weâve reimagined and reformulated all your favourite products and added new, specialized skincare treatments. Our entire catalog has been organized into seven collections that target universal skin concerns with powerhouse performance and a brand new look.
matchContent5: Select your current favourites from the list below to see whatâs new and what to look for.
matchContent6:
Don't have a current favourite?
Let's fix that, shall we?
regimenContent1: BUILD YOUR UNIQUE REGIMEN FOR CUSTOMIZED RESULTS
regimenContent2: Discover the ideal combination of products created to deliver noticeable results that only get better over time. Potent formulations backed by our heritage of breakthrough dermatological research reveal your best skin.
regimenContent3: Select your skin type for a perfectly tailored routine.
